E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1974
Subject: Brian Downing healing process
Brian Downing is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/9/1974
Subject: Progress of Jim Otten
Dear Sir,
Jim Otten is doing pretty good at A Greenwood Braves!
He has an ERA of 3.52, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1974
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Rico Carty
